sourcesContent:
<!-- display login and register buttons if user is logged in -->
<ion-item-group
  *ngIf="!(auth.currentUser$ | async)">
    <ion-button 
    color="secondary" 
    (click)="presentRegister()">
      Register
    </ion-button>
    <ion-button 
    (click)="presentLogin()"
    color="primary">
     Log In
    </ion-button>
</ion-item-group>

<!-- display the avatar if user is logged in -->
<ion-item-group
  *ngIf="(auth.currentUser$ | async)">
  <ion-button 
  color="secondary">
    {{(auth.currentUser$ | async)?.email}}
  </ion-button>
  <ion-button 
  (click)="logout()"
  color="primary">
    Log Out
  </ion-button>
</ion-item-group>
